SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_GET_PARTNERCONSTITUENCYCODES_TABLE_FORCONSTITUENT
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Returns a table of Partner-type constituency codes for a given constituent.
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL: create function dbo.USR_UFN_GET_PARTNERCONSTITUENCYCODES_TABLE_FORCONSTITUENT( @CONSTITUENTID uniqueidentifier) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN ( -- Add the SELECT statement with parameter references here select cc.[DESCRIPTION] as CodeDescription, count(cc.DESCRIPTION) as CodeCount from dbo.CONSTITUENCY c join dbo.CONSTITUENCYCODE cc on c.CONSTITUENCYCODEID = cc.ID where cc.DESCRIPTION like ('%Partner%') and c.CONSTITUENTID = @CONSTITUENTID group by cc.DESCRIPTION );
